title: Vintage Leather Jacket
description: Classic brown leather jacket from the 80s. Some wear on the sleeves but still in great condition. Perfect for motorcycle rides or just looking cool.

title: MacBook Pro 13-inch
description: 2019 MacBook Pro in excellent condition. 256GB SSD, 8GB RAM. Comes with original charger and box. Minor scratches on bottom.

title: Ikea Dining Table
description: White IKEA dining table seats 4 people comfortably. A few small marks on surface but very sturdy. Must pick up.

title: Nintendo Switch Console
description: Barely used Nintendo Switch with Joy-Con controllers. Includes dock, cables, and 3 games: Mario Kart, Zelda, and Super Mario Odyssey.

title: Vintage Record Player
description: 1970s turntable in working condition. Belt drive, needs new needle but otherwise great. Perfect for vinyl enthusiasts.

title: Mountain Bike
description: Trek mountain bike, 21 speeds, medium frame. Good condition with some rust on chain. Great for trails and city riding.
